questions.questionText: What are the core components of the IOTA economy?

answerOptions.answerText: IOTA token, gas fees, staking rewards, and voting.
Gas fees, smart contracts, token swaps, and oracles.
Validators, users, delegators, and gas price mechanisms.
Proof-of-work, storage fees, staking, and oracles.

questions.questionText: Who are the three main participants in the IOTA economy?
What role do gas fees play in the IOTA tokenomics?

answerOptions.answerText: Gas fees are used to provide staking rewards and prevent spam or denial-of-service attacks.
Gas fees are charged to mint new IOTA tokens.
Gas fees are distributed only to validators for transaction processing.
Gas fees allow users to vote in on-chain governance decisions.
